```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE)
```


```{r}
actionButton("counter", "Add")
counter = 0
```

```{r}
counter = eventReactive(input$counter, {counter + 1})
```

```{r}

renderPlot({
    ggplot(data.frame(counter=counter)) + geom_bar()
    # barplot(counter)
})
```
